players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I find it strange that Charlie has been killed so early in the game. We need to be vigilant and work together as a team to identify the mafia among us."
Diana: "I agree with Bob. We should all stay vigilant and work together to identify the mafia in our midst."
Diana: "I'm concerned about the recent turn of events in our game. Let's not jump to conclusions and instead focus on gathering information to ensure we can all feel safe in our village."

You: "Based on the evidence we have gathered so far, it seems that one of us is not who they appear to be. I believe it's important for us to work together and share information to identify the mafia in our midst and keep our village safe."

Bob: "I'd like to propose that we take turns sharing information about our night actions. This can help us build trust and make informed decisions as a team. I believe this approach will help us identify the mafia among us more effectively, ensuring the safety of our village..."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
